name: Déjà Vu: Eine phantastische Geschichte
overview: Déjà Vu: Eine phantastische Geschichte is a German illustrated text adventure from 1985. Déjà Vu is about a schoolboy who learns about the Garasim temple through a book. The temple is threatened with decay and with it the whole world. There are only 99 days left to save the temple. The plot of the game is very reminiscent of The Neverending Story of Michael Ende
